snippet: Joel Hanrahan allowed two runs in the ninth but struck out Dave Sappelt with the bases loaded to preserve Pittsburgh’s 7-6 win over the Chicago Cubs.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Pittsburgh Pirates defeat Chicago Cubs, 7-6; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Joel Hanrahan allowed two runs in the ninth but struck out Dave Sappelt with the bases loaded to preserve Pittsburgh’s 7-6 win over the Chicago Cubs.

headline.seo: Pirates Beat Cubs to Get Back Into Wild-Card Race
headline.main: Pirates Get on Track and Back Into Playoff Race
